version_description:
1) New integrated cloud services support for iCloud, Dropbox and Drive
2) Faster and improved sync with Microsoft HealthVault
3) iOS 7 support
4) Language support for Japanese, Korean and Italian
5) Bug fixes

1) Direct sync between iPhone and iPad. No need to sign in and share your data with cloud services or 3rd parties.
2) Filters in Graphs and History for measurement position and location
3) Apple Watch App support
4) Fixed issue of HealthVault to HealthKit data sync

1) Direct sync between iPhone and iPad. No need to sign in and share your data with cloud services or 3rd parties.

3) Apple Watch App support
